attributes.action: Increase the personal allowance to £15,000 by 2023.
attributes.additional_details:
Young people on low incomes specifically have been hit hard by the cost of the living crisis on top of alienating rises in national insurance recently.  
The government needs to pull itself together and realise that people can't afford to live and give their hard-earned money to older, wealthier people at the same time. 
If social care needs extra funding, a charity donation scheme should be set up instead of forcing struggling, hard workers to pay for it
attributes.background: I propose that the personal allowance is put up to £15,000 as the extra £70.00 in 2021 is useless for people when inflation is pushing 10% and national insurance rises aim to force the poor to fund the social care of older, wealthier homeowners.

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petition, which calls for a similar action:

Raise the income tax personal allowance to £15000 immediately
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/617227
